model

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Map

  • public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines a map. The map is made up of Tiles. These can be background tiles, object tiles, or grass tiles.
    Author:
    Andrew Rickus, Todd Wickizer, Sean Gemberling
